name: Hike Trip (itch)
description:
It's getting cold, so why not take a hike!

This game puts your survival to the test with a hiker who cannot jump to save her life and falls to the floor quickly. So one must make use of her other niche abilities.

Hopping - Well she can't jump, but she can hop, hold z to butt bounce across the floor.

you can also hop on enemies to kill them without consecutive bounces.

Climbing - You can climb any vertical surface in the game to reach areas most people could dream of.

Sleeping - That's right, a passive ability that can be used anywhere regenerate your health when in a pinch, just hold the x button!

This game is a demo, so it's pretty short. But I plan on developing a lot of levels to release it in the future! So be on the lookout for updates in the future. My discord tag is InfernoGaming#9102 and I will be building a YT channel for updates on this game in the meantime!
